page.title: 02PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: {THE SPORTSMAN }Public House is situated on the main Ramsgate Sandwich Road. Most types of BITTER from 72p _ 96p a pint. Patrons can obtain fast food meals and most of the custom comes from passing traffic with a few from the nearby village. An interesting feature of the cellar is the boarded up Victorian bread oven. There are at least 17 tubs in the cellar at any one time and about 300 barrels (9,000 gallons) are consumed per year. {MENU: }Ploughmans lunch Â£1.50p Scampi and Chips Â£2.30p Coffee 30p There are about ten different meals offered and there is a small restaurant area and a few seats outside which overlook Pegwell Bay. There is a large carpark and a small caravan site next to the pub.
